Title: Charity (Next Item)
Descriptions: Sometimes strangers and new survivors find our camp. They're always in need of food. If you can bring 5 food or drink items back to camp each day, you will be rewarded with 25x Casino Chips. These chips can only be exchanged for nails after gambling, so good luck! [This quest will also reset any EXP nerfs acquired from murder]
